website_summaries.verdict: The TCL Xess is a 17-inch Android tablet optimized for use in the kitchen, but it doesn't offer quite enough to merit its high price tag.
pros: Big, bright display with good viewing angles
Customized Android software with integrated recipes and multi-panel view

customer_reviews.title: so unless you like looking at your Instagram sideways you have to turn ...
customer_reviews.text: You cannot download all the Apps, even some basic ones are not supported. For example, the Old navy & Gap app says not supported for this device. The Apps you can install are not guaranteed to have screen rotation supported, so unless you like looking at your Instagram sideways you have to turn the giant heavy screen now 17.3 inches tall instead of wide. Also Alexa is not able to do certain skills like playing music. If the screen times out then Alexa is not accessible. The camera is a joke. The problems start with the connecting, quality, App and the manual is no help. I am going to return for a Google tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Codemo

customer_reviews.title: Tablet is OK
customer_reviews.text: Tablet works great at first, but after a few months it has started disconnecting from wifi and the Alexa service. It's a well built tablet, it feels very sturdy. Speakers are nice and loud. The battery is lacking a bit
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: ... my wife as Christmas gift since she spends a great amount of time in our kitchen preparing food
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this "kitchen" android base tablet for my wife as Christmas gift since she spends a great amount of time in our kitchen preparing food, cooking, baking, and the TCL Xess 17.3" Tablet is just perfect for her to watch news, search receipts, watching and following cooking instructions from youtube. She love it very much, and the TCL Xess is also a great tools to check emails, and connect to Amazon "Alexa" for verbal instruction and creates shopping list.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Camera does not work. keeps getting disconnected. the ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera does not work. keeps getting disconnected. the keyboard does not always work. I had to buy a blue tooth keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Could be so much better
customer_reviews.text: Does not respond that well to Alexa commands and the remote camera disconnects too often. Would like to have a method to print recipes from this device or be able to upload recipes that I have stored in the cloud or somewhere else on my network. Too much trouble to have to do that everytime that I want to use a recipe that is not part of the native version delivered with the device. There are too few recipes on that application to really make this as useful for recipes as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Product
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product. Essentially a very large Android tablet pre-loaded with a Kitchen-compatible app setup. Have not set up the Wifi camera yet, but it appears to be a very nice setup. Purchased for Boss's wife for Christmas. Arrived in great shape and very quick via Prime. Sure to be a conversation piece as well as a usable piece of technology for the Kitchen area!
customer_reviews.author: Joe O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for movies!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gadget! Alexa could be improved upon though. All in all i live this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, beautiful screen. The positives stop there. Alexa doesn't respond most of the time. Even though it is advertised as doing everything the Echo does, it will not work with Spotify. Big disappointment. Sent back within one day.
customer_reviews.author: Asher G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and was amazed at how durable it is and how crystal clear the screen is. It was easy to set up with Alexa and have enjoyed many of the feature including the Sports Updates and having it connect to my Nest thermostat. Planning to sit down and learn more about the other features Alexa has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Tim

customer_reviews.title: This is my first Alexa product and I love it. The immediate response is impressive and actually ...
customer_reviews.text: What a sleek looking product! This is my first Alexa product and I love it. The immediate response is impressive and actually feel like you're having a conversation. Our family loves the compatibility in our home, especially our kitchen.. it's quickly become one of most important tools. It's one of those products you don't realize how much you need it until you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Leber

customer_reviews.title: Better not lose of damage the power cord!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the large screen, but its sluggish. My biggest complaint was that we lost the power cord and could not find out how to replace it; we contacted TCL and they sent us to Alcatel; to date this is still pending..
customer_reviews.author: Nathan J Birckhead

customer_reviews.title: just opened my TCL XESS, I have charged it ...
customer_reviews.text: just opened my TCL XESS, I have charged it fully but it will not turn on. nothing happens when I press the power button. very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Product has multiple issues with the apps. Camera does not stay connected nor does the internet. Constant reboots to keep it running. I would return this if I wasn't past the return date so i will just toss it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Every household needs one !
customer_reviews.text: Alexa has grown up ! TCL XESS rocks with regard to design, accessibility, picture clarity, and ease of use. I enjoy exploring different segments of it and am always amazed at what I find. The thought behind it's features certainly define the household of today and of course the future. Love It !
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: Setting up Alexa was quick and straightforward and I enjoy getting the latest news and sports updates
customer_reviews.text: The screen size and sturdiness of the unit are very impressive. Setting up Alexa was quick and straightforward and I enjoy getting the latest news and sports updates. I am looking forward to connecting the unit to my Nest thermostat, lights, and other compatible smart home devices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TCL continues to impress...
customer_reviews.text: I already own a couple TCL TV,s which offer an amazing big screen picture, so I was excited to see what value this woud bring to the kitchen. No disappointment so far. Alexa functionality works seamlessly with my lighting, garage and sprinklers. I love the camera as I use it as a baby monitor. Ironically this entire device was cheaper than the baby monitor I purchased just a couple years back. Another great product, thank you TCL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: It's very functional and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I just open my new Xess, and it was beyond my wildest expectations. It's very functional and easy to use, especially with the Amazon echo. It is sleek and elegant, with a sharp screen, and is a great addition to our kitchen. I can't wait until our Nest comes, so I can tie the two together. What a remarkable product!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER J.

customer_reviews.title: It is OK..
customer_reviews.text: Great size, works as well as any other tablet but with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the Xess
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Xess. The screen is large, super clear and easy to read. I have mainly used it in my kitchen for recipe ideas, cooking tutorials and listening to music. I can ask Alexa pretty much anything from across the room and she answers my questions with the information I am looking for. I have watched a few movies and I was very impressed with the sound as well. I highly recommend the Xess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing all that this has to offer in one device
customer_reviews.text: State of the Art picture and sound, a ton of bang for the buck! It's amazing all that this has to offer in one device! Merry Christmas to me!
customer_reviews.author: MikeMcC

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: No ethernet connection unfortunately. Maybe on the next version... skip this one, wait for model 2.0
customer_reviews.author: TDelray

product_meta.title: TCL Xess 17.3-Inch Smart Home Hub with Amazon Alexa, JBL Audio, and Bonus Remote Camera
product_meta.description: • The layout of Xess is the same as any other android device. • The “Xess Mode” is just a layout change or overlay. It will not conflict with basic Android functions. • Alexa is a voice command system only. It will not open third party applications. It’s a big difference from Xess with Alexa and the Amazon Echo device. • Connecting the IP camera - There is a reset button on the IP camera itself. The user should press and hold this until camera is in connection status. From that point, the user can attempt the connection with Xess again. See the video below for a different method of connecting the IP camera. - New Version (TCL Alexa Xess): - Selling through Amazon site - Preloaded Apps: Alexa Voice Service; Amazon Store; Amazon Video; Amazon Music; etc.. - CU REF: P17AA-3ALCUS4
feature_bullets: Easily control your smart home with the Amazon Alexa Voice Service
Included remote camera makes it easy to monitor other rooms in your home
Get the latest news, scores, and weather by voice command from Alexa
Pre-loaded recipe applications and videos make meal discovery and planning a breeze
Carry handle, adjustable stand, and extended life battery make it easy to enjoy your favorite content anywhere
